serene.validation.handlers.content.util
Class ValidationItemLocator

java.lang.Object
  serene.validation.handlers.content.util.ValidationItemLocator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.Locator
public class ValidationItemLocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.Locator

Stores location and qName data for the stack of document items involved in validation. It is the responsibility of the client to know about the nature of the current item(element, attribute, character content).
